==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|もの|かた|o2=り|k2=がた|yomi=k|r=y}}

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|ものがたり|acc=3|y=k}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|ものがたり}}

# a [[tale]]; a [[story]]
#:{{ja-usex|指%輪'''物%語'''|^ゆび%わ '''^もの%がたり'''|{{w|The Lord of the Rings|The '''Tale''' of the Rings}}}}

====Usage notes====
Refers especially to a fictional or fictionalized narrative, the Japanese equivalent of the Western [[epic]], although not in poetical form and of much shorter length.
